00113 #ifndef __MEMORY_H
00114 #define __MEMORY_H
00115 
00116 typedef struct MemoryPool_rec MemoryPool;
00117 
00118 extern MemoryPool *mem_CreatePool(size_t chunksize, unsigned align);
00119 extern void mem_FreePool(MemoryPool *);
00120 extern void *mem_Alloc(MemoryPool *p, size_t size);
00121 extern void *mem_Realloc(MemoryPool *p, void *old, size_t oldsize, size_t newsize);
00122 extern int mem_AddCleanup(MemoryPool *p, void (*fn)(void *), void *arg);
00123 
00124 #endif /* __MEMORY_H */
